item.title: Getting started with Asterisk
item.description: asterisk installation on CentOS 6.X # Asterisk is an open source framework for building communications applications. You can use it for any of the following: IP PBX systems VoIP gateways ISDN/ 3G IVVR Here is a brief instruction for step by step installation of asterisk 1.8(or you can do for latest versions) on Redhat/centos (for other linux versions the commands are similar :) ). Step 1: Get the asterisk source code files from: Asterisk downloads
